Description: The Tomb of the Plautii, near the Ponte Lucano; a tall tower with ruined pilasters against an adjoining wall with large framed tablet, a low wall at right with narrow arch Pen and brown ink, with grey-brown wash
Bibliographic references: Hind 1915-31 / Catalogue of Dutch and Flemish Drawings preserved in the Department of Prints and Drawings in the British Museum (13)
Exhibition history: 2004-2005 Oct-Jan, Birmingham, Barber Inst of Fine Arts, 'Bartolomeus Breenbergh 'Joseph in Egypt'
